item.description:
• Join us!

Join us for the 6th Turkish Cooking Classes and learn the secrets of the world famous Turkish Cuisine from experienced chefs. New sessions will begin on Jan 28th. The five cooking class sessions will be held every other Saturday from 11 am to 2pm. Each session is $10, $40 for all five sessions. All are welcome to join!

Place: Turkish Cultural Center Connecticut

Address: 727 Campbell Ave. West Haven CT 06516

To register: cookingclass@turkishculturalcenterct.com or call 203-8094403

www.turkishculturalcenterct.com
item.how_to_find_us: Derya Mercan Is the Chef and Host

group.name: New Haven Wine and Dining Meetup Group,

item.name: Turkish Cooking Class " Don't Miss This" Third Session
